attributes.action: Prevent enforced vaccination on NHS and  health and social care sector employees
attributes.additional_details: Vaccination is a choice and to be coerced, discriminated against or segregated for choosing not to have the covid 19 vaccination is a breach of our human rights
attributes.background: I want people already working in healthcare jobs to not face discriminatory action for refusing the covid 19 vaccination and for new employees not to be denied employment in the NHS or health and social care jobs for refusing the covid 19 vaccination

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require health and social care workers to take covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577842

Prohibit employers from requiring employees to have a Covid-19 vaccine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575607
